DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine study drug safe , tolerable active reduce albuminuria patient Chronic Kidney Disease Type 2 Diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Study CKD Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Albuminuria
DOC.criteria: Males female age 18 80 year , inclusive . Body mass index 18 45 kg/m2 , inclusive . Type 2 diabetes mellitus receive ≥1 glucose lower medication least 3 month prior randomization Stage 3 CKD MSSBP ≥130 mmHg Urinary albumin : mean UACR ≥ 200 mg/g Urinary albumin : UACR > 3500 mg/g History renal transplant MSSBP > 180 mmHg MSDBP > 120 mmHg two occasion screen runin period History inflammatory bowel disease diarrhea predominant irritable bowel syndrome
